mapper.insert: insert into info ( url, is_conn, port, email, tel, creation_time, expire_time, company, last_update_time, file_name, ip, web_phone, qq, wx, address, title ) values ( #{url}, #{isConn}, #{port}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{creationTime}, #{expireTime}, #{company}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{fileName}, #{ip}, #{webPhone}, #{qq}, #{wx}, #{address}, #{title} )

insert into info ( url, is_conn, port, email, tel, creation_time, expire_time, company, last_update_time, file_name, ip, web_phone, qq, wx, address, title ) values
( #{url}, #{isConn}, #{port}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{creationTime}, #{expireTime}, #{company}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{fileName}, #{ip}, #{webPhone}, #{qq}, #{wx}, #{address}, #{title} )
